bio.singa.javafx.renderer.graphs

Class GraphDrawingTool<NodeType extends Node<NodeType,Vector2D,IdentifierType>,EdgeType extends Edge<NodeType>,IdentifierType,GraphType extends Graph<NodeType,EdgeType,IdentifierType>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • bio.singa.javafx.renderer.graphs.GraphDrawingTool<NodeType,EdgeType,IdentifierType,GraphType>

  • public class GraphDrawingTool<NodeType extends Node<NodeType,Vector2D,IdentifierType>,EdgeType extends Edge<NodeType>,IdentifierType,GraphType extends Graph<NodeType,EdgeType,IdentifierType>>
extends java.lang.Object
    This class tries to arrange a graph using force directed placement.
    The algorithm is based on Fruchterman, Thomas MJ, and Edward M. Reingold. "Graph drawing by force-directed placement." Softw., Pract. Exper. 21.11 (1991): 1129-1164.
    With some modifications.
